Keynote Speakers

Prof. Elena Rodriguez

Director of AI Research, Tech University

"The Future of AI in Communication Systems"

Prof. Rodriguez is a leading researcher in artificial intelligence with over 20 years of experience in the field.

Dr. James Chen

Chief Technology Officer, Quantum Solutions

"Quantum Computing: Breaking Barriers in Computational Power"

Dr. Chen has pioneered several breakthroughs in quantum computing and holds multiple patents in the field.

Dr. Sarah Johnson

Head of Cybersecurity Research, Global Tech

"Next-Generation Security Protocols for IoT Ecosystems"

Dr. Johnson is renowned for her work in developing secure communication protocols for interconnected devices.
